mean_en: the number, amount, rate of something, expressed as if it is part of a total which is 100; a part or share of a whole; a share of the profits of something
sentence: GDP fell by four percentage points this quarter—what a disaster!
sentence_trans: 这个季度GDP下降了4个百分点，真是一场灾难！
word_etyma: percent百分之几 + age状态，总称 → 百分比
